docs.lead_paragraph: THERE is a Hollywood instinct to think of female boxing as a destitute gal's career choice alternative to exotic dancing. Trade one exploitive job field for another. Substitute pole dancing for shadowboxing. Insert lounge owners for fight promoters. Exchange lustful barflies bent on skin for ringside celebs lusting for blood.

headline.main: Boxing May Benefit From the New Wave of Women Entering the Ring

docs.abstract: BOXING MAY BENEFIT FROM THE NEW WAVE OF WOMEN ENTERING THE RING*4
docs.snippet: The death of Becky Zerlentes could symbolize an important change in the way boxing is viewed, fighters are treated and safety standards are enforced.
